script_line.statement: importPackage(Packages.com.workpoint.client);[lf]importPackage(Packages.java.text);[lf][lf]dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");[lf]ThisJobData.setBulkUserData("CustomerDesiredDate", dateFormat.format(new Date (new Date().getFullYear()-1,new Date().getMonth(),new Date().getDate())));
